rules: Rule1: Provided that a player completed the game, that player enjoyed the game.
Rule2: In case the game wins an award, the game is successful.
Rule3: Either the game won an award or the game sold well.
Rule4: If the developer was promoted, then an investor is happy with the game.
Rule5: Either a sequel is planned for the game, or if the game has a multiplayer feature, then the game is successful.
Rule6: Provided that DLC is planned for the game, it is not the case that a sequel is planned.
Rule7: Either the game has a single-player feature, or if the game has a multiplayer feature, then the game is successful.
Rule8: If new content was added to the game, then DLC is planned for the game.
Rule9: Either new content was added to the game or a balance patch was applied to the game.
Rule10: In case the price of the game dropped, a discount offer was made for the game.
Rule11: Assuming a discount offer was made for the game, the game does not have a crash bug.
Rule12: Either a soundtrack was added to the game, or if the graphics of the game were updated, then the game has a graphics glitch.
Rule13: Provided that microtransactions were added to the game, if the game is not successful, then a player enjoyed the game.
Rule14: Whenever the game is review-bombed, players protested the game.
Rule15: If the game had a free weekend, then the game was in early access.
Rule16: Either the game had a free weekend or a demo of the game was released.
Rule17: Assuming a demo of the game was released, if the game is not successful, then a player enjoyed the game.
Rule18: Provided that the game was in early access, if the game is not successful, then a player enjoyed the game.
Rule19: If the servers of the game were stable, then the game did not have server issues.
Rule20: Whenever a roadmap was published for the game, an investor meeting occurred for the game.
Rule21: If the developer fixed the crash bug in the game, then if it is not the case that if the game is not successful then the game does not have a crash bug, the game has a graphics glitch.
Rule22: Provided that a tester found the crash bug in the game, if it is not the case that if the game is not successful then the game does not have a crash bug, the game has a graphics glitch.

Rule23: Either the game was released on time, or if it is not the case that either the developer fixed the crash bug in the game or a tester found the crash bug in the game, then the release of the game was not delayed.
Rule24: If it is not the case that if a player recommends the game then that player rated the game highly, then a player refunded the game.
Rule25: Provided that it is not the case that if the game sold well then the game is successful, the developer was promoted.
Rule26: If it is not the case that if the game sold well then the game is successful, a roadmap was published for the game.
Rule27: In case it is not true that if the game sold well then the game is successful, an investor is not happy with the game.
Rule28: Provided that it is not the case that if the game sold well then the game is successful, an investor meeting did not occur for the game.
Rule29: If it is not the case that if a balance patch was applied to the game then DLC is planned for the game, the community is angry about the game.
Rule30: Assuming it is not true that if a balance patch was applied to the game then DLC is planned for the game, the community is not angry about the game.
Rule31: Provided that it is not true that either the developer fixed the crash bug in the game or a tester found the crash bug in the game, the release of the game was delayed.
Rule32: In case it is not the case that either the developer fixed the crash bug in the game or a tester found the crash bug in the game, the game did not undergo internal testing.

Rule33: If it is not the case that if it is not true that either the developer fixed the crash bug in the game or a tester found the crash bug in the game then the game underwent internal testing, the game had a public beta.
Rule34: Provided that it is not the case that if it is not true that if the game is not successful then a player completed the game then a player rated the game highly, the game had server issues.
Rule35: Assuming it is not the case that if the game is not successful then a player completed the game, a player recommended the game.
Rule36: In case it is not true that if the game is not successful then the game does not have a crash bug, the graphics of the game were updated.
Rule37: Whenever microtransactions were not added to the game, the game was review-bombed.
Rule38: Assuming microtransactions were not added to the game, players did not protest the game.
Rule39: Provided that the game is not successful, the price of the game dropped.
Rule40: In case the game is not successful, the game has a crash bug.
Rule41: Provided that the game is not successful, a player did not enjoy the game.
facts: Fact1: The game has a multiplayer feature.
Fact2: The servers of the game were stable.
Fact3: It is not the case that a player rated the game highly.
Fact4: It is not true that a player refunded the game.
Fact5: The game does not have a single-player feature.
Fact6: The game did not have a public beta.
Fact7: A soundtrack was not added to the game.
Fact8: The game does not have a graphics glitch.
Fact9: The game was not released on time.
